oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1955-12-17 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from December 17, 1955. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ray Price (host/performer), guest performer Jean Shepard, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Tommy Jackson, Lew Childre, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ray Price; Rod Brasfield; Jean Shepard; Tommy Jackson; Lew Childre; Del Wood
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Ray Price -- Run Boy (Ray Price) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Ray Price) -- Ray Price introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Ray Price) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Ray Price) -- Ray Price introduces Jean Shepard -- I Thought Of You (Jean Shepard) -- Ray Price introduces Tommy Jackson and Lew Childre -- Old Joe Clark (Tommy Jackson fiddle, Lew Childre calls) -- Ray Price talks -- The Old Rugged Cross (Ray Price) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Ray Price) -- Prince Albert jingle (Ray Price) -- Ray Price introduces Del Wood -- Twelfth Street Rag (Del Wood)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Price, Ray, 1926-2013; Brasfield, Rod; Wood, Del; Jackson, Tommy; Childre, Lew, 1901-1961; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Shepard, Jean, 1933-
